com.varmateo.yawg.util

Class GlobMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.varmateo.yawg.util.GlobMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Predicate<Path>

    public final class GlobMatcher
extends Object
implements Predicate<Path>
    A predicate for checking if a path matches a given collection of glob patterns.
